body_html:
@IssamLaradji I've coded a BatchSampler which from time to time updates its own scores for each sample in the batch and resamples according to that distribution at each iteration. Maybe it's useful for grounding some further work.

https://gist.github.com/ozancaglayan/8ff67259f73e18be078177f1ae5a7805

body:
@IssamLaradji I've coded a `BatchSampler` which from time to time updates its own scores for each sample in the batch and resamples according to that distribution at each iteration. Maybe it's useful for grounding some further work.

https://gist.github.com/ozancaglayan/8ff67259f73e18be078177f1ae5a7805
